price: Nokorε sε abͻneεfoͻ no bεtena Amanehunu gya asotwee mu.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
